failure.message:
`cy.request()` failed on:
https://api.unsplash.com/me
The response we received from your web server was:
> 422: Unprocessable Entity
This was considered a failure because the status code was not `2xx` or `3xx`.
If you do not want status codes to cause failures pass the option: `failOnStatusCode: false`
-----------------------------------------------------------
The request we sent was:
Method: PUT URL: https://api.unsplash.com/me Headers: { "Connection": "keep-alive", "Authorization": "Bearer INux6IxQuZLjnBq9Sg00riAK7CNUNODvts_uA6EpGkY", "accept": "application/json", "user-agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Cypress/10.6.0 Chrome/102.0.5005.148 Electron/19.0.8 Safari/537.36", "cookie": "_gat=1; _sp_ses.0295=*; _gid=GA1.2.450129159.1661078506; ugid=362e4df03dfadb940f70063d8ad70d185536928; _ga=GA1.2.1537267963.1661078506; _sp_id.0295=9a7bd37c3f6d30ef.1661078507.1.1661078511.1661078507.4daa5805-41b4-4817-975b-dc5ada5589ab", "accept-encoding": "gzip, deflate", "content-type": "application/json", "content-length": 214 } Body: {"username":"default_username","first_name":"default firstname","last_name":"default lastname","url":"https://default.com","location":"default location","bio":"default bio","instagram_username":"default_instagram"}
-----------------------------------------------------------
The response we got was:
Status: 422 - Unprocessable Entity Headers: { "connection": "keep-alive", "server": "Cowboy", "content-type": "application/json", "access-control-allow-origin": "*", "access-control-request-method": "*", "access-control-allow-headers": "*", "access-control-expose-headers": "Link,X-Total,X-Per-Page,X-RateLimit-Limit,X-RateLimit-Remaining", "cache-control": "private,max-age=0,stale-if-error=300,stale-while-revalidate=0", "x-unsplash-version": "v1", "content-language": "en", "x-ratelimit-limit": "50", "x-ratelimit-remaining": "31", "x-request-id": "f8a773ad-d10c-4179-b8f9-06d9c1c83bb2", "x-runtime": "0.271341", "content-encoding": "gzip", "strict-transport-security": "max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains", "via": "1.1 vegur, 1.1 varnish, 1.1 varnish", "accept-ranges": "bytes", "date": "Sun, 21 Aug 2022 10:41:51 GMT", "x-served-by": "cache-iad-kjyo7100091-IAD, cache-qpg1259-QPG", "x-cache": "MISS, MISS", "x-cache-hits": "0, 0", "x-timer": "S1661078511.781697,VS0,VE505", "vary": "Accept-Encoding, Origin,Authorization,Accept-Language,Accept", "transfer-encoding": "chunked" } Body: { "errors": [ "Username has already been taken" ] }
https://on.cypress.io/request
Because this error occurred during a `after all` hook we are skipping the remaining tests in the current suite: `Edit Profile`
